kalayak mama kundalini bhawana karanawa.eewayinuth me thewana asa sambandha bhawana walata thamayi mul thana dunne.mulinma kale sulanga ekka karana widiya.karapu mul dawasema nalala naliyanna wela pupuru gahanna wage danuna..eeta passe anga depaththata paddenna gaththa..passe tika kalayak bhawana karanna wune na..passe aayeth patangaththe me gindara nalala madn yanawa kiyala hithana bhawanawen..ara mulin wechcha dewal serama eka digata wenna patangathatha..konda dige hiri watla yanawa.nikam inna welawatath nalala pupuru gahanawa.gindarak dakka gaman nalala naliyanawa.ee gindara nalalata adila enawa wage danenawa mata..passe digata karan yaddi nalale pupuru gahana gathiya wadi wela nalalata ulakin anala haranna wage kakkumak aawa..eka digata dawas 2 k ee kakkuma ehemama thibuna..passe mama ee bhawanawa athhariya..eeth aaye mata patanganna loku uwamanawak thiyanawa..karunakarala mata uladesak denana.

thara athiru dhawana pathawala pawathi tharagawali waladi daskam dakwuwo : ■ ‘oo’kandaye (si. dha. 125 sita 160 dakwa) samanya yathurupadi shurathawa - hansika abesinha ■ ‘em’ kandaye (si. dha. 250 dakwa) samanya saha nawikaranaya karana lada yathurupadi (strit trel) shurathawa - udana perera ■ ‘em’ kandaye (si. dha. 175 sita 250 dakwa) nawikaranaya kala saha nawikaranaya nokala yathurupadi shurathawa - shoyel daniyel ■ ‘em’ kandaye (si. dha. 600 dakwa) nawikaranaya kala saha nawikaranaya nokala yathurupadi shurathawa - shoyel daniyel ■ ‘es-em.’

wathman parli­me­nthuwe manthri aasa­na­wala ithi­ha­saya ema aluth parli­me­nthuwe aara­mbhaya dakwa aathata diwa­yayi. 1982 wasare aprel masaye shri jaya­wa­rdhana pura kotte nawa parli­menthu mandi­raya wiwrutha kala da sita sthapitha manthri aasa­na­wala kisidu wena­sak methek sidu kara nathi athara, me wana wita ema manthri aasa­na­wa­lata wasara 36k para­niya.
